post_title: Place to celebrate birthday with 20-25 people

comments.author: stip754
comments.body: Le hygge Is great!! Much more affordable than other bars and so cozy

comments.author: Temporary_Celery5667
comments.body: The Holzkranich Bar has a room in the basement that you can rent. Otherwise, there are also cultural centers that rent out rooms cheaply.

comments.author: Prudent-Lock-8359
comments.body: I just checked and it looks perfect! When you say renting it means there is something to pay unlike a normal reservation right?

comments.author: Temporary_Celery5667
comments.body: You can do both: make a reservation as well as rent the cellar room :) The best thing to do is just give them a call or send them an e-mail. Ja
